page.title: 08GOWY VALLEY ATTITUDES
page.content: As in many communities that have had new housing added there is some feeling of resentment towards newcomers. These are gradually being broken down as more contact through school, church & clubs is made. Most people are content to be living in a rural enviroment.There is some concern that the bus service is sparse, expensive and does not run at night. Some nuisance from groups of youths mostly noise & some vandalism. {SOCIAL CONCERN}Major concern to Guilden Sutton and Littleton is the final link between the M53 & the North Wales trunk road which will affect the villages and may lead to their being engulfed by Chester's urban development.Maintaining the{SCHOOLS}in both communities has a high priority. Guilden Sutton has been scheduled for a new school for 15 years.
